name: StanfordNLPSentiment
description: This node performs Sentiment Analysis with Stanford NLP on the given input column. Refer http://www.sparkflows.io/nodes-nlp for steps to install models.jar

fields.name: inputCol
fields.title: Input Column for Sentiment
fields.description: Column containing the text for sentiment analysis

fields.name: outputCol
fields.title: Output Column for Sentiment
fields.description: Output column containing the result of sentiment analysis
